tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_home_preferences (
	user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	display_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	favorite_color VARCHAR(20),
	sleep_pattern TIME,
	wake_up_time TIME,
	temperature_preference FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE automation_patterns (
   pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   pattern_name VARCHAR(50),
   pattern_description TEXT,
   CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_preferences (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_patterns (
    pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    sleep_pattern BOOLEAN,
    activity_pattern BOOLEAN,
    work_pattern BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE usage_patterns (
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, device_id, action, timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    user_id INT,
    recommendation_id INT,
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, recommendation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    preferred_temperature INT,
    preferred_lighting VARCHAR(50),
    preferred_music_genre VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_patterns (
    pattern_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    activity_pattern VARCHAR(100),
    time_of_day_pattern VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (pattern_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_preferences(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE automation_recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    recommendation_title VARCHAR(100),
    recommendation_description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (recommendation_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_preferences(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_notifications (
    notification_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    notification_type VARCHAR(50),
    notification_text TEXT,
    notification_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (notification_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_preferences(user_id)
);
